originalText.text: I had cosmetic rhinoplasty done by Dr Horn on 11/2 and extremely happy with results .  Very minimal bruising and fast recovery. Dr Horn was very thorough during initial consultation, explained the process step by step and answered every question I had . She followed up on me after surgery to make sure my pain is controlled .My nose looks very natural , symmetrical and scar is barely visible. She is amazing!

originalText.text: Seven months ago, I had a necklift and upper blepharoplast with Dr. Horn.  She was extremely thorough in the consultation and I was pleased she said I didn't need a full facelift even though that would have been a much more expensive procedure.  Originally, the surgery was to have been done at Mt. Sinai's Union Square location, but the hospital very abruptly cancelled due to some training they were conducting.  I very much appreciated that Dr. Horn was sensitive to the fact that I had carefully planned the timing of the surgery.  Rather than reschedule, she went out of her way to contact colleagues to arrange an alternative site on the same date.  She performed the surgery in a private facility opposite the Metropolitan Museum of Art.  It was a fabulous experience - more like a spa than a hospital surgical theater but just as rigorous in terms of cleanliness etc.  I have enjoyed her friendliness and candor throughout the entire process.  And the results are so natural looking!

originalText.text:
I highly recommend Dr. Horn if you’re looking for an ENT. She’s clearly a skilled plastic surgeon, as is evidenced by her professional Instagram and other reviews online, but my experience with her is as an otolaryngologist.

Dr. Horn was incredibly helpful, she explained what issues I was having to me, and she prescribed a course of medicine to help. She had me visit her one week later to check my progress, as well, and this visit was just as pleasant as the first. It’s hard to find quality doctors in the city, but Dr. Horn certainly is one of the best I’ve seen.

originalText.text: Dr. Horn is incredible - not only does she do great work but is also very caring and personable. Her staff is also very professional and friendly. Thank you Dr. Horn for being so supportive before, during, and after surgery!

originalText.text: Performed unnecessary services that ended up costing me a ton of money.  They claimed they advised it was a needed endoscopy procedure when I could of blown my nose into a tissue.  Overall, felt like I got conned and scammed into paying a huge bill.
